name: A CUBE IN HELL
description:
In this game you need to complete all levels in hell to go in heaven.

Tutorial:

In this game you need to complete the levels. You are the orange cube. If You don't know if is a enemy or a box you can see if is moveing.
You have a grappling hook.You can use it only for flying platforms.
You can push boxes. Enemy and boxes are rezistent to lava, but you don't.
Don't die. 

Game Developer:     NopeGuy
